name: title International Job Placement
des: In the era of globalization, why is your job placement target only Bangladesh? Close to 50% of our recent graduates are getting interns or jobs overseas.

name: title Option to watch offline videos
des: You do not have a reliable internet! You can use our neptune app (android and ios) and windows desktop app to watch videos offline without.

name: Special Job Placement Coach
des: Those who will finish the main course and SCIC (Super charged Interviewee club) will get access to work with the Job Placement Coach.

name: Unlimited Support
des: Any questions you may have will be answered within 10 hours during the course

name: Live Conceptual Session
des: Our live conceptual sessions will clear your doubts through live coding in different projects.

name: Complete Web Development Course
des: Learn everything it takes to get a job as a junior web developer from scratch
